By absolute numbers more people die of the flu, yes. However, recent flu strains have a fatality rate around 0.1% (excepting H5N1 which was 60%). COVID19 appears to have fatality rate ~2.5% more than 20 times higher than most flu strains!

How can you be so wrong? Have you considered that COVID19 is still very localized? That we have a vaccine for the flu? That is it way deadlier? Have you considered that maybe the reason why there is not that many deaths is because we quarantined people?
